games.title: TB World
games.description:
Discover the fascinating world of the game Toka Life, which will give you a sea of creativity and joy! Here you can bring your fantasies to life, creating stylish images for characters and cozy interiors.

The design process will be a real pleasure: choose from a variety of clothes, accessories and interior items to make each image and space unique. Transform your characters and their surroundings to create a unique atmosphere.

This game is your personal creativity workshop where you create your own story. Start your exciting journey into the world of design today and let your ideas flow, creating unique images and cozy interiors!
games.howToPlayText:
The game opens up endless possibilities for creativity and fun, with your main task being to bring your fantasies to life and create unique stories.

The controls are intuitive and user-friendly, making it perfect for players of all ages. The simple interface allows you to easily move characters, items, and decor by swiping across the screen. You can tap on clothing and accessories to dress up your characters and drag items to decorate interiors.

In TB World, there are no strict rules or fixed storylines. You become the author of your own adventures and stories, using a wide range of scenarios, characters, and items. Your imagination is the only limit in this world of creativity and possibilities!

games.title: Robbie: Draw your Sword
games.description: Enter the exciting realm of Robbie: Draw your Sword, a dynamic online adventure game. Gather swords, complete challenges, and level up to transform your character. Enjoy this free game on mobile or desktop, unlocking various outfits, pets, and abilities. Are you prepared to become the ultimate warrior?
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
WASD - Movement
LKM - Swing and draw sword üí™
Spacebar - Jump
PCM and mouse movement - Rotate the camera

üì± Smartphone:
Move - Joystick on the left side of the screen
Camera rotation - Finger movements on the right side of the screen
Click on the screen - Swing and draw sword üí™

games.title: Obby: Dumb or Genius IQ Test
games.description: Welcome to Obby: Dumb or Genius IQ Test! üß†‚ú® ‚Äì the ultimate game where intelligence is key! Test your brainpower by completing fun mini-games üïπÔ∏è, taking on exciting challenges üèÜ, and engaging in PvP duels ü§∫ to earn IQ points and level up. Collect IQ scattered across the map, win mini-games for extra boosts, or spin the wheel of fortune for random IQ rewards. The more IQ you gain, the higher your status in the game, with trophies üèÜ that can be exchanged for cool pets üêæ. Prove you''''''''''''''''re the smartest player and rise to the top of the leaderboard. Ready to show off your genius? Play now and take your IQ to the next level!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
The game can be played using either keyboard or touch controls. On the computer, use the arrow keys or WASD to move. Interact with objects by left-clicking or placing the character in a highlighted circle. Press space to jump. On the phone, the touch controls are intuitive: use the left joystick to move and the right button to jump. To interact with objects, simply tap or place the character in the circle.

games.title: Hexa Block Puzzle
games.description:
Try our highly addictive unique hexagonal pieces puzzle game!
Use your puzzle skill and put blocks into board.
Hexa BlockPuzzle will improve your logical skills and mind power.
Difficulty level will be increase as much as you play.
games.howToPlayText:
Arrange the hexagon blocks to fit in the board / grid.
You can‚Äôt rotate the block.
One‚Äôs you put into grid you will rearrange too.
No time limits!
Getting stuck! Don‚Äôt worry use hint.

games.title: Obby The Legendary Dragon
games.description:
An exciting and addictive pet catching simulator for pokemon lovers. Travel through different roblox worlds and a lot of leveling heroes in one place!

Collect health, upgrade your hero to explore the most amazing worlds of this game. Catch pets in battles, hatch them from cases and eggs, buy and exchange them to get the strongest helpers and friends. Earn money and upgrade your Obby character with the help of ranks and titles.

games.description: Obby: Royal Races in Flight is an exciting online racing game where players can unlock fast cars and navigate challenging courses. Available on multiple platforms, it features stunning 3D graphics, opportunities for car upgrades, and fun for all ages, including exclusive options for premium members.

games.title: Shopping Simulator
games.description: Earn game money by tapping the hamster, raise the customer's level and buy everything from the store shelves. Anime, horror, food, pets, household goods, hundreds of heroes in one place! Buy anything you want! More than 500 unique items, 200 leveling levels, lots of mini-games and lots of emotions are waiting for you!
games.howToPlayText: Earn game money in different mini-games to upgrade your level! Tap the hamster and complete the puzzles to get as many as possible! Unlock new levels to become the best!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/Shopping-simulator?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Colors&Forms
games.description: Colors&Forms is a thrilling online game that tests your reflexes and strategy. Enjoy a variety of entertaining puzzles and colorful designs without any downloads. With different game modes available, you‚Äôll find countless challenges to complete as you progress through the levels.
games.howToPlayText:
The control is simple - move the pieces at the bottom of the tracks to match the falling elements and complete the missions on each level.
Before the game, choose the appropriate game mode by speed.
Be careful, there may be objects on the screen that you need to interact with by clicking on them.
To switch the type of game, use the button with the image of a castle.
Change the language, disable music and sound effects in the game settings.

games.description: Get ready for a thrilling sound-based challenge with "Guess Monster Voice." In this exciting online game, you‚Äôll identify legendary creatures by their chilling noises. Available on both mobile and desktop, dive into the realm of mythical beings and demonstrate your skills‚Äîall for free.

games.title: Find The Dog
games.description: Get ready for some lighthearted fun! Explore whimsical black-and-white scenes filled with charming details and see how many cleverly hidden pups you can find. Each dog is playfully tucked away in different settings ‚Äî from cozy parks to bustling streets ‚Äî just waiting to be spotted. There's no rush, just relax and enjoy the search!
games.howToPlayText:
Get ready for some lighthearted fun! Explore whimsical black-and-white scenes filled with charming details and see how many cleverly hidden pups you can find. Each dog is playfully tucked away in different settings ‚Äî from cozy parks to bustling streets ‚Äî just waiting to be spotted. There's no rush, just relax and enjoy the search!

Controls:
üñ± Mouse: Move your cursor to explore the image.
üñ± Left Click: Click on a dog to find it.
üîç Scroll Wheel: Zoom in and out to get a closer look.
üñ± Hold Left Click + Drag: Pan around the image.
üí° Hint Button (bottom left): Tap it to reveal the location of a hidden dog when you're stuck.

Have fun, and see if you can find them all!

games.title: Geek Escape: Run for Survival
games.description: Geek Escape: Run for Survival is an exciting arcade game where players control a nerdy hero racing against bullies. Available for free online on various platforms, it combines action and strategy. Players dodge obstacles and use trash cans as weapons in this thrilling adventure filled with excitement.
games.howToPlayText:
Arrow keys to navigate
Spacebar to throw trash cans
Shift key for speed boost

games.title: Bubble Stars Boxes: Shade and Juju
games.description: In this addictive game, 88 different characters and 671 skins on these characters are waiting for you! Open the crates and old crates in which all these characters and skins are hidden! Take the challenge and try to complete all the events in the game! Win in battles and get cups, become the best in this game! And how far can you go?
games.howToPlayText:
The navigation in this game is very simple.
Just use the mouse on desktop or your finger tap on android device.

games.title: Chainsaw 3D
games.description: Chainsaw 3D is an exciting online arcade game where you cut logs using a chainsaw. Available for free on multiple platforms, this engaging woodcutting challenge blends skill and puzzle elements, requiring concentration to succeed at each new level. Aim to become the top woodcutter!
games.howToPlayText: Use mouse or finger to rotate chainsaw up and down. Avoid obstacles and cut through the lines! Be the best woodcutter!

games.title: Mine Jump
games.description: Join the exciting world of Mine Jump, an engaging online experience that merges quick thinking with rapid actions. Explore a captivating realm where each jump reveals hidden treasures. Enhance your character and uncover the mysteries of an alien planet, all while enjoying the thrill on any device!
games.howToPlayText:
Jump, jump, jump! A challenging reaction and logic game that won't let you get bored! Collect slugs, pump up your hero and find the edge of this planet!

Click on the left or right side of the screen to move diagonally on a cell. If you make a mistake, you can go back. Get as far as you can to find out all the secrets of this mysterious planet!

games.title: Hide the Monster: Choose Pose
games.description: Hide the Monster: Choose Pose is a fun online puzzle game where you assist cute monsters in escaping danger. Enjoy challenging levels that test your logic under pressure, with escalating difficulty as you find the best positions for the monsters to remain hidden.
games.howToPlayText: Click to change the monster's pose, drag it to match the cover shape, and save it before time runs out!

games.title: Labubu Geometry Waves
games.description: Labubu Geometry Waves is an avoider game. Play as tiny plane, avoid any obstacles, gain power up and enjoy Labubu dancing. Avoid any obstacles on the screen, grab any power up, and reach the finish. Challenge all 40 level of chaotic level!
games.howToPlayText: Use left mouse button only. Hold left mouse button to going up, release to going down.
